Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Berteau
ShortDescription: #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Montrose, Cicero then resume their normal route on Milwaukee, due to street blockage near Milwaukee/Berteau.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Clark/Lake. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier door problem at Clark/Lake.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
